titleStmt.title: A vindication of the Church of Scotland being an answer to five pamphlets, the titles of which are set down after the preface / by the author of the former vindication in answer to ten questions.
titleStmt.author: Rule, Gilbert, 1629?-1701.

notesStmt.note: Written by Gilbert Rule. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
